about_the_game:
You're an employee on a late night shift at The Motel, an old, quiet roadside stop just before the big city in Oakhill Grove. Your job is simple enough: keep things in order and handle what needs doing until morning. At first, the night seems like any other, but a news broadcast crackling through the radio changes everything. There's someone dangerous roaming the outskirts of Oakhill Grove. Will you make it through the night shift, or will The Motel become your final stop?

In The Motel, your night begins with a list of tasks left by the boss on a note. You’ll complete these tasks one by one. Serving guests, tidying up, and occasionally taking a moment to pet the motel’s lobby cat. But as the night progresses, you’ll need to stay sharp. The game features multiple endings, leaving your fate in your hands. Will you outlast the night, or become another victim. This game is a 40-60 min light-horror, ambient, funny experience.

  •   Sound Effects: Merulino Music, Justus,

  •   In-Game Music: Merulino Music

  •   Trailer Music: Pedram Mo

content_descriptors.notes:
The Motel contains themes and depictions that may not be suitable for all audiences. These include:

Violence and Gore: Scenes involving blood, the aftermath of violent acts, and unsettling imagery.
Tense and Disturbing Situations: A killer on the loose creates moments of suspense and fear, including the potential for jump scares.
Mature Themes: The storyline touches on crime and survival in a high-stakes setting.
This game does not include depictions of sexual acts, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm, but it is intended for mature audiences due to its intense atmosphere and violent content. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10+ (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: No support.
  • Additional Notes: Intergrated graphics can still handle the game on the lowest settings, but a GPU is strongly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10+ (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • VR Support: No support.
  • Additional Notes: Intergrated graphics can still handle the game on the lowest settings, but a GPU is strongly recommended.

short_description: Work the late-night shift at The Motel, an old roadside stop near Oakhill Grove. Complete simple tasks until a news broadcast reveals a dangerous killer is nearby. Can you survive the night?
